organization.fullName: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

identificationModule.briefTitle: Evaluation of the Role of IgE Responses to Der p 1 and Der p 2 in Chinese House Dust Mite-Allergic Patients
identificationModule.officialTitle: Evaluation of the Role of IgE Responses to Der p 1 and Der p 2 in Chinese House Dust Mite-Allergic Patients

leadSponsor.name: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

descriptionModule.briefSummary: One hundred patients were enrolled, based on sensitization and doctor-diagnosed allergy to HDM. Questionnaires were administered to document demographic and clinical characteristics. Serum IgE reactivity toDermatophagoides pteronyssinus (Dp) extract, Der p 1, Der p 2 and Der p 10 was measured by ImmunoCAP.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription: Background: The role of specific IgE (sIgE) against Der p 1and Der p 2 in Chinese patients with house dust mite (HDM)allergy has not yet been well investigated.Methods: One hundred patients were enrolled, based on sensitization and doctor-diagnosed allergy to HDM. Questionnaires were administered to document demographic and clinical characteristics. Serum IgE reactivity toDermatophagoides pteronyssinus (Dp) extract, Der p 1, Der p 2 and Der p 10 was measured by ImmunoCAP.

primaryOutcomes.description: Describe the patient's basic information in detail, including age, gender, family history, etc
Prevalence of Der p 1 Serum IgE in HDM-Allergic Patients
Prevalence of Der p 2 Serum IgE in HDM-Allergic Patients

primaryOutcomes.measure: Dp, Der p 1 and Der p 2
primaryOutcomes.description: Relationship between Serum IgE Levels of Dp, Der p 1 and Der p 2

primaryOutcomes.measure: Factors associated with specific IgE against Der p 1
primaryOutcomes.description: Study the patient's basic information and identify factors that are clearly associated with specific IgE against Der p 1

primaryOutcomes.measure: Factors associated with specific IgE against Der p 2
primaryOutcomes.description: Study the patient's basic information and identify factors that are clearly associated with specific IgE against Der p 2
Association of Specific IgE Titers with the Number of Affected Organs

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* HDM-allergic patients reporting allergic rhinitis, conjunctivitis, asthma and/or atopic dermatitis and who had never undergone immunotherapy, were enrolled if they were sensitized to Dp as judged by ImmunoCAP ( ≥ 1 kU/l) and/or skin reaction index (SRI)by skin-prick test (SPT, a wheal diameter ≥ 0.5 mm).

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who refused to participate in the study.
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: All patients were evaluated by a physician face-to-face, using a detailed questionnaire to establish the nature and severity of their clinical manifestations. The questionnaire also included demographic characteristics, a family history of allergic diseases and any other history of allergic disease.

locations.facility: Second Affiliated Hospital，School of Medicine，Zhejiang University

ancestors.term: Congenital, Hereditary, and Neonatal Diseases and Abnormalities
